entry.title: International Aviation Meet at Belmont Park (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that American aviator John Moisant crashed his plane twice before participating in the 1910 International Aviation Meet at Belmont Park (pictured)?

entry.title: Battle of Plum Point Bend (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the casualties suffered at the Battle of Plum Point Bend were very light given the amount of ordnance expended?

entry.title: Jalen Redmond (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Jalen Redmond received the offer of a college athletic scholarship before having even played in a high-school football game?

entry.title: Church of St. Jacob (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Church of St. Jacob, which had been used for centuries by Prussian Lithuanians in Klaipėda, was demolished by soldiers of the Soviet Armed Forces using tanks in 1959?

entry.title: Ruth Northway (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Ruth Northway is the United Kingdom's first professor of learning disability nursing?

entry.title: Teruzuki (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the Japanese destroyer Teruzuki was sunk by a single torpedo to the stern?

entry.title: received two nominations (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Angel Aquino received two nominations for Best Supporting Actress at the 2014 Gawad Urian Awards?

entry.title: Whistling Dick (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Whistling Dick was "of rather modest proportions"?
